description:
Looking for a Business Analyst with 4-5+ years that is business savvy (not technical) with experience with business management and marketing for a long term contract, possibly to hire.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Work closely with service teams, stake holders to gather requirements
  • Creates weekly Powerpoint presentations for meetings
  • Reviews dashboards and reports
  • Create roadmaps
  • Schedule and run meetings
  • Create Epics
  • Works heavily with Jira
  • Create User Stories in Jira

What You Will Need

  • 4-5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, gathering requirements
  • Strong business savvy, business acumen, not looking for technical background but business
  • Experience with Business Management and Marketing
  • Experience with Jira
  • Must have excellent business acumen, collaborative and very detailed oriented
  • Experience creating Roadmaps, User Stories, Epics
  • Experience with Dashboards and Reports
  • Experience with MS Office Suite, O365, Microsoft PowerPoint
